item.title: Team Fortress 2
item.description: Stolen from https://store.steampowered.com/app/440/Team_Fortress_2/ Pretty OG game if I do say myself. Still can’t access the chat for some reason, I think somebody said online that I gotta buy something from the store, so I might do that. Anyway, first you have to install lib32-gperftools Run this line in launch options: LD_PRELOAD=$LD_PRELOAD:/usr/lib32/libtcmalloc_minimal.so %command% -secure
